nodes.text: The cybernetic eyes Mod III were a model of cybernetic eye available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The eyes were produced by Athakam Medtech, and considered one of their finest achievements as there were no errors visible to observers despite the eyes clearly being artificial, a feat incredibly hard to achieve with cybernetic eyes. The eyes cost 7500 to install and increased a user's visual acuity and recognition.
The cybernetic eyes Mod III was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013 and written by Sterling Hershey.
